<NEW>

Wheelie nodded, "Life can go on.  We can le t=
hem know, how things in the past can change and go.  To the Autobots in far=
 deep space, they shall not have to live in eternal disgrace.  If Megatron =
shall change the past, can we both leave him agahst?  Whatever Hydras here =
thinks he has, can we not escalate for better whereas?  For can we not figh=
t fire wtih fire?  Changing the future to our better desire?"

Whispering q=
uietly, "Could we bring Optimus back?  LEt the Cybertronian Resistance know=
 hope holds out to cut them some slack?  Is that what we can do?  A message=
 sent tot his time to breed hope anew?  It would be so easy, it wouldn't ev=
en leave us queasy.  Just prop up the Ark's Distress Beacon, have it flux a=
nd send home a story?  To tell them of it's glory?  By the time they got ba=
ck here, we would be gone and the Ark free and near.  It would give us reas=
on to send everyone home, the Decepticons and Predacons themselves to toss =
a bone.  For they could not hold out against and army, they would abandon t=
he field as would we."
